  <p align=center> <span style="font-size:5em;"> Tyler J. Pike </span> </p>
  
   

---  
  
###   

I am a PhD candidate in Economics at the University of Maryland and U.S. Census Bureau intern. My research interests include topics in macro-finance, firm dynamics, and information economics. 
  
  &nbsp; 
  
### [Background](./content/Tyler_Pike_CV.pdf)  
  
1. University of Maryland  
    - Economics PhD Candidate  
    - U.S. Census Bureau intern (2024 - current)  
    - Research Assistant to John Haltiwanger  (2022 - 2024)  

2. Federal Reserve Board   
    - Research Assistant to Vice Chair Clarida   
    - Research Assistant to Macro-Financial Anlaysis Section      

3. University of Richmond  
    - BS in Mathematical Economics   
    - Economics Research Assistant and Research Fellow    

  &nbsp;
